text: @PressSec He would be alive if @realDonaldTrump didn’t spread lies calling covid19 a hoax and you are just as guilty. What are you gonna tell your daughter in 20 years when she asks “ Mom why did you lie and spread misinformation killing tens of thousands of people ? #TrumpKilledHermanCain
